title: Eracism, Welcome To ‘93! 6.25.20
itunes:title: Eracism, Welcome To ‘93! 6.25.20
description:
In episode 659, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Danielle Radford to discuss Bill Barr continuing to f*ck the country, the Blackface apology tour by Jimmy Kimmel, Tiny Fey, and more, third degree racism, the massive dust cloud floating across the Atlantic and coming for the Southeast United States, the drive-in movie theater box office, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. STATEMENT FOR THE RECORD: Assistant United States Attorney Aaron S. J. Zelinsky
  2. Testimony of John W. Elias U.S.House: Committee on the Judiciary
  3. Hollywood’s Blackface Apology Tour Isn’t Very Convincing
  4. The Difference Between First-Degree Racism and Third-Degree Racism
  5. Massive Sahara desert dust plume closing in on the United States
  6. ‘Jurassic Park’ Roars To No. 1 Again At Weekend Box Office, 27 Years After Original Release
  7. Domestic 2020 Weekend 25
  8. WATCH: Wet - Old Bone (Jim-E Stack Remix - Official Audio)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
